law.full_text:
CONSTRUCTION NOISE.
Noise due to construction or repair work shall be regulated as provided by Section 41.40 of this Code. (Amended by Ord. No. 161,574, Eff. 9/8/86.)

unit.catch_line: Radios, Television Sets, And Similar Devices.
Air Conditioning, Refrigeration, Heating, Pumping, Filtering Equipment.
Powered Equipment Intended For Repetitive Use In Residential Areas And Other Machinery, Equipment, And Devices.
Maximum Noise Level Of Powered Equipment Or Powered Hand Tools.

next_section.catch_line: Powered Equipment Intended For Repetitive Use In Residential Areas And Other Machinery, Equipment, And Devices.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
CONSTRUCTION NOISE. (§ 112.03)
CONSTRUCTION NOISE. Noise due to construction or repair work shall be regulated as provided by Section 41.40 of this Code. (Amended by Ord. No. 161,574, Eff. 9/8/86.)
